name: Citrix XenApp / XenDesktop
description:
Provides visualization of data obtained using the Citrix Delivery Controller OData API.

##defaultResourceProduct## can be updated on a (cloned) dashboard for XenDesktop uses.

config.name: ##defaultResourceProduct## Applications by Peak Concurrent Instances (Last 24 Hours)

items.name: ##RESOURCENAME##
items.dataSourceDisplayName: (XenApp Application Usage|XenApp Connection Failure Trends|XenApp Datastore Status|XenApp Delivery Groups|XenApp Logon Performance|XenApp Machine Catalogs|XenApp Machine Failure Trends|XenApp Machines)
